Description: Fragment of flattened handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium very micaceous orange-red. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and bucranium symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Aristophanes? Bon, A. and A., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos (Paris 1957) 385. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 62, 2.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0015)
